articles.description: Fulton entered the bout as one of the top 10 fighters in the world, an unbeaten world champion who had the advantage of size going into the bout. Inoue...
articles.content: Naoya Inoue, left, of Japan throws a punch against Stephen Fulton of the U.S. during the seventh round in a fight for the unified WBC and WBO super-bantamweight world titles in Tokyo, Tuesday, July 2… [+4979 chars]
